text:
BNOTIONS - Toronto, Canada - Full Time

We're looking for talented web & mobile software engineers, as well as data scientists.

Some of the tools/frameworks/languages we use: Python, Scala, Javascript, Django, AngularJS, Hadoop, Mahout, NGINX, Redis, PostgreSQL, and many more.

For more information hit the link below: http://bit.ly/1l1RZVF

Or shoot me an email: nahim at bnotions.com

Cheers and Happy New Year!
